item.description:
This meetup is now closed to new rsvps. There maybe a few openings that pop up during the summer, so contact me directly if you decide you might want to play and we'll see if we can work you on to a team.

Games will be at Artesani Park located off Soldiers Field Rd in Brighton, MA from 6:15 â€“ 8:30 Wednesday nights.

REGULAR SEASON -The regular season will last From June 23rd to August 18th.

Championship Weekend - All league players will receive free lodging at the Brettl-Hupfers Ski club in Bartlett, NH on the championship weekend. A party and cookout will be held after the games, and the winning team will receive prizes.
item.name: Outdoor Summer Volleyball League in Boston
